question: A friend of yours is thinking of going on a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He/she has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:* explain why you think your friend would enjoy a camping holiday* describe some possible disadvantages* say whether you would like to go camping with your friend this summer
text: I hope you are doing well. I am writing with regard to your upcoming camping vacation.

I believe that your trip is going to be fantastic. I know that you are a fan of outdoor activities and this is the best way to experience nature. And the most striking point of this tour is that this area is renowned for its flora and fauna.
This outing, however, also has some detrimental points as you have to make so much preparation. Due to the isolated location and there is not a single eatery, so you have to cook by yourselves only.
As I mentioned last week that summer is my busy season, I can not make my plan to join you. I hope in the near future if you have any other plan, I will definitely join you.
I look forward to hearing from you about your trip once you come back from your vacation.

error_list.error_des: It seems that plan may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
